data.name: restaurants
data.details: Try a variety of cuisines that is sure to satisfy your taste buds during your stay here in Davao City!

data.name: Tourist Spot
data.details: Whether you're looking for a place to relax and enjoy the beauty of Davao, or if you want an adventure that will take your breath away, we've got you covered.

data.name: Hotels
data.details: Here, you can enjoy and relax in comfort while having fun with family and friends. With a lot of selection, you can find a hotel that will satisfy your budget and make your stay more enjoyable.

data.name: Shopping
data.details: If you're looking for something new and trendy, look no further than our stores in Davao City! We have everything you need to make your life easierâ€”from groceries to clothes to electronics and more.

data.name: Entertainment
data.details: You'll find everything you need to make your stay in Davao unforgettable, from fun to relaxation to thrilling activities.
